API_Description: Resets the field values within a document. Resetting a field causes it to take on its default value (which, in the case of text fields, is usually blank).

aFields.description: (optional) An array specifying the fields to reset. If not present or null, all fields in the form are reset. You can include non-terminal fields in the array.

Examples:
This example shows how to reset a whole subtree. For example, if you pass “name” as part of the fields array, all `name` fields, such as `name.first` and `name.last` , are reset.

```
this.resetForm(["name"]);
```
